formatted_address: 1 Jalan Eco Botanik 3/4, Taman Eco Botanik, 79100 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Manzanita PÃ¢tisserie & Boulangerie - Eco Botanic

reviews.text: I had a wonderful experience at this restaurant! The service was impressively quick, and the staff was exceptionally friendly. All the food items were freshly prepared and absolutely delicious. One of my friends had a headache and needed a Panadol, and the staff provided it promptly, which was very thoughtful. The ambiance was lovely, and the staff was incredibly attentive, even accommodating multiple requests from kids with great patience. The customer service here is truly top-notch. Highly recommended!

All 18 of us had a wonderful time breaking our Ramadhan fast at Manzanita. The staff were accommodating, polite n ever willing to help n serving us  with delight. The food was absolutely amazing. Every dish has its freshness n so tasty. The beef salad n beef stew were my favourite. My main, the pan seared Norwegian Salmon is unrivaled. Shout out to our ever friendly server Aung Hsan, the Assistant Captain in aiding us in a birthday celebration also. And  making our dining experience so memorable.

At first glance, everything wowed me when I stepped into the place. Brightly lit and everything was attractive and tempting. Took a seat and ordered. That was when things started to not go so well.

Food was ok but took quite a long time to arrive. Not sure how many staff was there, but they didnâ€™t seem to be a rush. Dirty cups and stuff were piling up.

Also bought some pastries to take away. Wasnâ€™t really tasty. Looked better than how they tasted.

this is my fourth time come here, all the staff are so friendly!! the reason i keep repeat here because the service and the menu so tiptop!! recommended ðŸ’—
hello update again, here's my fifth time and my second review!! the tiny + cheerful chinese staff was so friendly hahaha, i really the way she keep smiling to the cust!! my mom also give the compliment about all the food !!

Had a good dining experience here with friendly staff and attentive attendant by the name Jun kang. The food taste is good and the appearance is exactly as in the menu. The cozy environment + delicious food & cake + friendly and professional staffs makes me and my family dining so comfortable. Definitely will come. Again.

vicinity: 1 Jalan Eco Botanik 3/4, Taman Eco Botanik, Iskandar Puteri
